DDL:
CREATE TABLE Cards (
    id INTEGER,
    table_id INTEGER,
    location_id INTEGER,
    promotion_id INTEGER,
    event_date TEXT,
    event_id INTEGER,
    url TEXT,
    info_html TEXT,
    match_html TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Matches (
    id INTEGER,
    card_id INTEGER,
    winner_id TEXT,
    win_type TEXT,
    loser_id TEXT,
    match_type_id TEXT,
    duration TEXT,
    title_id TEXT,
    title_change INTEGER
);
